title: I was just told that Smarties are not sold in America
body:
Along with Coffee Crisp and Crispy Crunch.

Is this true? Do you not eat the red ones last?!

http://i.cbc.ca/1.2973590.1424969383!/cpImage/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/16x9_620/food-smarties-package.jpg

https://www.valuevalet.ca/images/upc/z/106178.JPG

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/7/75/Coffee-Crisp-Wrapper-Small.jpg

Are these foreign chocolates to you guys??
